item.title: Milestones
item.description: Developmental and cognitive milestones are behaviors/skills that children exhibit at a given age. However all children develop differently and can reach these milestone at different times. The checklists that track milestones are just an example of a typical development observation at a given age. Some children develop more rapidly in some areas than in others, and the time frame in which a normally developing child reaches a certain milestone can vary quite a bit.
